ygData.messageBody:
Okay, here's the deal with pets:<br><br>Your pet
gets a fraction of the xp if and ONLY if they make the
killing blow. You'll see a lot of higher-end necros and
mages dismiss their pets when a mob gets low on health
or starts the "frantic escape" mode. This is to
ensure that they get full XP for the mob.<br><br>This
really isn't something to worry about at lower levels.
I'm playing a mage on Lanys. Last night I, with two
other mages and a Necro, all using pets, laid waste to
the Warrens for a good two hours and gained about 3
bubs of XP.<br><br>Speaking of which, I'm going to
start a new thread in just a moment about hunting
spots...
